member.name: WS_RECEIVE_OPTION
member.summary: Specifies whether a message is required when receiving from a channel.

member.name: WS_RECEIVE_OPTION.WS_RECEIVE_REQUIRED_MESSAGE
member.summary: A message is required to be received. If the channel does not have any more messages, then the function will fail.

member.name: WS_RECEIVE_OPTION.WS_RECEIVE_OPTIONAL_MESSAGE
member.summary: The message is not required to be received. If the channel does not have any more messages, the function will return WS_S_END. (See Windows Web Services Return Values.)
